title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
August 3, 2020
On Monday, August 3, 2020, the President signed into law:S. 4209, the “Protecting Nonprofits from Catastrophic Cash Flow Strain Act of 2020,” which amends title IX of the Social Security Act to improve emergency unemployment relief for governmental entities and nonprofit organizations.
